oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pie eating contest at Elizabeth Park, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1960s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: African American children enjoying a pie eating contest at Elizabeth Park in Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1960s. Elizabeth Park is located at 1701 Arthur Avenue, between cross streets Jane Street and 11th Avenue N. Affiliated with Metro Board of Parks and Recreation, Elizabeth Park is located near Bicentennial Mall in North Nashville. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
